item.title: Tweet Pinboard: October 2017 - December 2017
item.description: I feel so good that our scrum board doesn't have a column called "to test". The beauty is that testing can happen anytime. #30daysoftesting — ğ™ ğ™šğ™«ğ™ğ™£ . (@KevCui) September 30, 2017 4 levels of Testing Inception: Real World Cloned Replicated World Simulated Parallel World Mocked Fantasy World Go deeper, don't be stuck. — ğ™ ğ™šğ™«ğ™ğ™£ . (@KevCui) October 2, 2017 My 1st #testbash experience was really amazing! Great talks, awesome testers, nice location, decent food.

item.title: Tweet Pinboard: June 2016 - December 2016
item.description: 1/4 How does #QA prevent defects? My opinion is "Not really". Similar to how to prevent sickness? — @KevCui June 8, 2016 2/4 Right release & #QA processes, like good habits, are necessary but not sufficient. Some unexpected virus can still break immune system. — @KevCui June 8, 2016 3/4 Instead of preventing deflects, #QA should be able to point out issues as early as possible and figure out the risks as well.
